column2: title=''SEVEN: An Anglo-American Literary Review'', Volume 17

column3: Marion E. Wade Center of Wheaton College]]

column1: '''''SEVEN''''', '''Volume 17''' is a volume of ''[[SEVEN]]'', a scholarly journal published by the [[Marion E. Wade Center]].
The article "Tolkien and Esperanto" reprints [[J.R.R. Tolkien
column2: Tolkien]]'s letter "[[A Philologist on Esperanto]]", and also includes quotes from the [[Book of the Foxrook]].

column1: *"'Dear Jim...': The Reconstruction of a Friendship"
*"Dante and His Daughter: Dorothy L. Sayers's Response to Maud Bodkin"
